codextypes.description: Specialized content types requiring custom interior design and formatting.

standard.name: Standard Book
standard.description: Traditional layout with chapters and standard formatting.

supplementary_materials.description: Optional supplementary materials that illuminate the domain the imprint operates in. These materials are loaded and included in LLM prompts when generating content for this imprint.
supplementary_materials.usage_notes: Paths can be absolute or relative to the imprint config directory. Supported formats: .txt, .md, .markdown, .docx, .pdf. When enabled and use_supplementary is True in batch operations, these materials will be included in model calls using the largest available context window.

b5k_metadata.examples: ‘Earth Wisdom Oracle: A Guide to Nurturing Your Spirit’, ‘The Celestial Oracle Deck’
